Summary: I saw a white disk in the sky moving side to side
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Greenville
There were no other sightings in Greenville on or around March 17th 2000
divs: Sighting DetailsAt my friends Justins old house.He hit the baseball in the air and i saw it.Idid not know what it was at first.I thought it was weird and cool before andafter.It was a white disc moving side to side really quick.I turned to tell myfriend and i looked back and it went up behind a tree real quick!!!
